record.field: Bank Reconciliation Line with amount "%(amount)s" in statement_line "%(statement_line)s" cannot be deleted'
Statement "%(statement)s" cannot be deleted because it contains lines.
Moves Amount "%(moves_amount)s" does not match Amount "%(amount)s" in line "%(line)s".
Line "%(line)s" cannot be deleted because it is not in Draft or Cancelled state.
You cannot import a bank statement file in a bank statement with lines.
The supplied file does not have the expected format.\n This is the technical error returned by parser:\n %(error)s.
You cannot modify the currency to journal that already has a statement on date %(date)s
It is not possible to modify the field "%(field)s" as the payment type "%(type)s" is used on %(model)s "%(name)s"
Can not set Payment Type in move line "%(payment)s" because account is not Payable nor Receivable.
The Account of Bank Journal "%(bank_journal)s", is not configured as "Bank conciliation".
Line "%(line)s" already reconciled with bank statement line "%(statment_line)s" with amount "%(amount)s". Please remove bank conciliation and try again.
